bibl.title: Coptic Documentary Papyri from the Beinecke Library (Yale University). (Publications de la Société d'Archéologie Copte. Textes et Documents. XVII.)
bibl.note: See pp. 1-17: an outline of the main examples of Greek and Coptic documentary papyrus codices, sixth to eighth centuries.
MacCoull Leslie S.B., Coptic Documentary Papyri from the Beinecke Library (Yale University). (Publications de la Société d'Archéologie Copte. Textes et Documents. XVII.)
Cairo, Society for Coptic Archeology, 1986, 4°, vii-63 pp. et 71 pll.
